Module contents¶

cryspy

General set of tools for manipulating and calculating molecular crystal. Existing electronic structure programs are interfaced with each other for ONIOM calculations with different levels of sophistication in the embedding.

© Copyright 2018, Miguel Rivera, Michael Dommett, Rachel Crespo-Otero.

Built with Sphinx using a theme provided by Read the Docs.
